issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.50.1b16

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.neoseeker.com/forums/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Ad script, causes more blocked ads to try and connect.
Script's name shifts from "prebidneo7" and "prebidneo6" as far as I remember, so it could be a good idea to add the filter from below.
`||staticneo.com/neoassets/js/prebidneo`

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

issue.title: Google Play: exam.RealtimeSubway
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=exam.RealtimeSubway](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dexam.RealtimeSubway) ### Comment > First Image, only use AdGuard. (Showing the 'Google' ads) > > Second Image, use AdGuard and private DNS setting in this devices. > DNS url is 'dns.adguard.com' > > Why are a difference? > I wish second result when I use only AdGuard. > > Please give me a solution. > I did everything I can do and give to you all informations. > > > > > 첫번째 이미지는 AdGuard만 사용했을때입니다. > > 두번째 이미지는 AdGuard와 기기의 Private Dns 설정에서 dns.adguard.com를 썼을 때입니다. > > 왜 이 두가지의 광고 차단 효과가 다릅니까? > 전 첫번째 경우에서도 광고가 아예 안보이는 효과를 원합니다. > > 필요한 설정과 로그는 제공했으니 확인해주세요. > 모든 설정 내용은 충분히 제공했는데 매번 같은 설정을 확인하라는 답변만 와서 솔직히 답답합니다. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.tumblr.com/g5mlp/722197667027025920/the-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tumblr.com%2Fg5mlp%2F722197667027025920%2Fthe-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > While not logged in, an uncloseable login prompt when scrolling down on not only frontpages, but also very long individual posts nowadays. > > Since the mass exodus from Twitter to Tumblr seems to me personally like it'd warrant fast treatment, I'll let you guys borrow `www.tumblr.com#?##glass-container:has(p + p):has(a[href^="/auth/google?"])` from Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List into AdGuard Popups Filters with no reservations or conditions of any kind. Alternately you guys can also use whichever entries you guys would write. > > The entry has worked for at least 2 months now, even if there still may be other Tumblr-side annoyances remaining (Most notably that the ••• buttons don't work after scrolling down slightly, which I never found a good fix for). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/3ile3nh8woe884w0k8gog4kw0k4gsg86bgh67exwww.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBO 1.50.0 + I Don't Care About Cookies 3.4.7 Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Ad Blocking:
